sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app-bar app fixed :elevation="3">
    <v-app-bar-nav-icon></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
    <v-app-bar-title>{{ drawer }}</v-app-bar-title>
    <v-divider vertical></v-divider>
    <template v-slot:append>
      <v-btn
        color="green"
        variant="outlined"
        append-icon="mdi-login"
        class="ml-3 mr-2"
      >
        Login
      </v-btn>
    </template>
  </v-app-bar>
</template>
<script>
import { mapState } from "vuex";

export default {
  name: "HeaderComponent",
  components: {},
  data() {
    return {};
  },
  methods: {},
  computed: {
    ...mapState(["drawer"]),
    windowWidth() {
      return this.$vuetify.display.width;
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style></style>
